scenario_text.value:
I did it! I protected this place that meant
so much to both of us!
Yeah... Thanks, Aoi. Youâ€™re amazing, really!
And you, Labramon... Thank you so much.

It was the strength of your resolve that led
me to take on this form.

No longer am I the watchdog of Hades, but the
judge and protector of all life...Anubimon.
Yes... Truly you have gained such strength.

So long as your heart is strong and true, you
need not fear anything.

Let us continue to fight together, to protect
the ones we care about.
